# Python Examples

Examples have been moved to interactive Jupyter notebook tutorials for a better learning experience.

## Tutorials

See the [tutorials directory](../../../docs/tutorials/) for hands-on notebooks:

- **01-basic-training.ipynb** — Train your first GBDT model
- **02-sklearn-integration.ipynb** — Use with sklearn pipelines
- **03-classification.ipynb** — Binary classification with AUC
- **04-multiclass.ipynb** — Multi-class classification
- **05-early-stopping.ipynb** — Prevent overfitting
- **06-gblinear-sparse.ipynb** — Linear models for sparse data
- **07-hyperparameter-tuning.ipynb** — Optimize performance
- **08-explainability.ipynb** — Feature importance and SHAP
- **09-model-serialization.ipynb** — Save and load models
- **10-linear-trees.ipynb** — GBDT with linear leaves
- **11-sample-weighting.ipynb** — Handle class imbalance

Or view them online in the [documentation](https://boosters.readthedocs.io/tutorials/).
